thread.title: The argument about grammar schools is one the left can easily win | Deborah Orr
thread.title_full: The argument about grammar schools is one the left can easily win | Deborah Orr

title: The argument about grammar schools is one the left can easily win | Deborah Orr
text: The argument about grammar schools is one the left can easily win | Deborah Orr Saturday, 17 October 2015 (36 minutes ago) Grammar schools are an example of everything that is wrong with British education – and shows up the Conservative contempt for people who don’t belong to the educational elite A new state grammar school is being opened in Kent, cunningly disguised as an extension to one of 164 surviving grammar schools and linked by a ...
